author: Xbox
description:
Gain unparalleled access with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. Explore more than 400 games on console and PC and play new games on day one, plus unbeatable benefits like unlimited cloud gaming, an EA membership, Ubisoft + Classics, Fortnite Crew, in-game benefits, play and earn up to 100,000 points a year in the Store with Rewards, and more. Your next adventure begins with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. 

Join Xbox Game Pass now: https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass

Game library and features vary by plan, by region and over time. https://www.xbox.com/gamepass

title: Announcing new updates to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate

author: Xbox
description:
Get what you need with Xbox Game Pass Essential, formerly known as Game Pass Core. More than 50 modern classics on console and PC, unlimited cloud gaming, online console multiplayer, in-game benefits, Rewards, and more are at your fingertips with Xbox Game Pass Essential. 


Join Xbox Game Pass now: https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass

title: Introducing Xbox Game Pass Essential

author: Xbox
description:
Dive into more than 200 must-play games with Xbox Game Pass Premium, formerly known as Game Pass Standard. With access to new Xbox-published games within a year of launch, unlimited cloud gaming, online console multiplayer, in-game benefits, and play and earn up to $50 a year in the Store and Rewards, and more, your next favorite game awaits with Xbox Game Pass Premium. 

Join Xbox Game Pass now: https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass

Game catalog and features vary by plan, by region and over time. https://www.xbox.com/gamepass

title: 50+ games from legendary franchises with Ubisoft+ Classics now included with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate

author: Xbox
description: That includes the Fortnite Battle Pass, 1,000 V-bucks every month, and more muscle
title: Get ready. On November 18, Fortnite Crew is coming to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate!

author: Xbox
description:
Xbox Game Pass is getting an upgrade! We're introducing 3 updated plans for subscribers: Xbox Game Pass Essential, Premium, and Ultimate. Learn more to play with the right one for you!

https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2025/10/01/xbox-game-pass-ultimate-premium-essential-plans

Xbox Game Pass Ultimate features over 400 console and PC games and more than 75 day one games per year, with EA Play and Ubisoft+ Classics included and Fortnite Crew coming in November.

Xbox Game Pass Premium includes over 200 console and PC games, with new Xbox-published games within a year of launch.*

Xbox Game Pass Essential offers over 50 console and PC games.

Join Xbox Game Pass now: https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass

Game library and features vary by plan, by region and over time. https://www.xbox.com/gamepass

*Excludes Call of Duty titles

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

title: What's new and what's changing with Xbox Game Pass

author: Xbox
description:
Xbox Game Pass is here to give you more. Choose from Ultimate, Premium, and Essential plans, all of which include games on PC and console, cloud gaming, online console multiplayer, in-game benefits, and much more. Discover your next favorite game with Xbox Game Pass. 

Xbox Game Pass Ultimate features over 400 console and PC games and more than 75 day one games per year, with EA Play and Ubisoft+ Classics included and Fortnite Crew coming in November.

Xbox Game Pass Premium includes over 200 console and PC games, with new Xbox-published games within a year of launch.*

Xbox Game Pass Essential offers over 50 console and PC games.

Join Xbox Game Pass now: https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass
